## Description {#details}

Helper to parse a META&#95;BLOCK for a bitstream remark container.

Definition at line 29 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h">BitstreamRemarkParser.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### BitstreamMetaParserHelper() {#ac68bb7d5a2b3927673738c771a092207}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BitstreamMetaParserHelper::BitstreamMetaParserHelper (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamcursor">BitstreamCursor</a> &amp; Stream, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamblockinfo">BitstreamBlockInfo</a> &amp; BlockInfo)</>}>
Continue parsing with <code>Stream</code>.

<code>Stream</code> is expected to contain a ENTER&#95;SUBBLOCK to the META&#95;BLOCK at the current position. <code>Stream</code> is expected to have a BLOCKINFO&#95;BLOCK set.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h/#l00045">45</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h">BitstreamRemarkParser.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp">BitstreamRemarkParser.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### parse() {#a826ea9c4393f00429edd20d09fb16e75}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Error BitstreamMetaParserHelper::parse ()">
Parse the META&#95;BLOCK and fill the available entries.

This helper does not check for the validity of the fields.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h">BitstreamRemarkParser.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp/#l00202">202</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp">BitstreamRemarkParser.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
